channel.title: Homes on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on My New Hugo Site

item.description: START Supplier Inventory Manufacture Customer Finance Report

Purchase Management Supplier Supplier / Vendor Data Category Product Product Bahan Satuan Beli (Kg/Liter/Dozen etc) Harga Beli Report Workflow RfQ –> PO –> Vendor Bills Order Date (Tanggal PO di buat) Payment Terms (15 days, 30 days, etc) Taxes Billing Status (Waiting Bills, Open, Paid, Cancel) User Executor
Inventory Management Inventory Stock Product Gudang Qty Konversi Satuan (Kg -> gr / Liter -> ml / Dozen -> Unit etc) Receipts Delivery Orders Manufacturing
Manufacturing Bill Of Material Product Jadi Product Bahan Product UoM [Unit of Measure] Workflow Confirm –> In Progress –> Done Phantom BoM

Sale Management Customer Customer Data Category Product Product Jadi Harga Jual Report Workflow Quotations –> SO –> Customer Invoice Order Date (Tanggal SO di buat) Payment Terms (15 days, 30 days, etc) PPN Disc % Invoice Status (Waiting Bills, Open, Paid, Cancel) User Executor

Finance Accounting Journal Entries CoA (Chart of Account) Payment Method (Cash, Bank) Vendor Bills Customer Invoices Report Dashboard Workflow Draft –> Open –> Paid Integrasi dengan Purchase & Sale Order Date (Tanggal Bills & Invoice di buat) Status (Open, Paid, Cancel) User Executor

Report General Reports Pivot Bar Chart Line Chart Pie Chart Dynamic Report [Filter & Group By] Format Excel (.xls} PDF (.pdf) Accounting Reports General Ledger Trial Balance Balance Sheet Profit and Loss
